synopsis.text:
The prophecy foretold the arrival of a young boy, Hermes, destined for greatness in ancient Greece. As the chosen hero, Hermes embarks on a perilous journey to confront the malevolent King Minos, who has been wreaking havoc on Crete and its neighboring states. With the divine blessing of Ophealis, God of Creation, Hermes strives to restore peace and unity to the land, ultimately becoming its king.

Alongside his beloved companion Aphrodite, Hermes experiences a myriad of thrilling adventures, from exploring the mystical realm of the gods to descending into the depths of Hell. Their love remains unwavering as they face the challenges that lie ahead, including raising a child together.

This captivating anime film, produced by the Happy Science cult, brings the legendary story of Hermes to life, showcasing his courage and determination in the face of evil. Join Hermes and Aphrodite as they navigate the trials and tribulations of their extraordinary lives, culminating in an epic battle that will determine the fate of Greece.
